meanings.definition: The state or quality of being excessively sweet.
meanings.sent1: The oversweetnesses of the dessert made my teeth ache.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't handle the oversweetnesses of the sugary drink.
meanings.sent3: The oversweetnesses of the cake was so intense, it almost tasted like pure sugar.
meanings.sent4: Her words were dripping with oversweetnesses, making them hard to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The oversweetnesses of the candy was like a sugary explosion in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: The oversweetnesses of the syrup overpowered the pancakes.
meanings.sent2: She found the oversweetnesses of the frosting too much to handle.
meanings.sent3: The oversweetnesses of the love letter made her cringe a little.
meanings.sent4: The oversweetnesses of the moment lingered in the air like a sticky cloud.
meanings.sent5: The oversweetnesses of the fruit juice was like drinking liquid sugar.
